---
title: "Starting your own project"
---

Now, that have introduced R to you. What next? How will you start working on your own research project in R? Worry not, this part of the workshop is designed to give you a kick-start 


## Goals

In this part, you will learn how to:

 - create a new R Project
 - create an R script inside a "scripts" folder
 - read in a data set
 - move data into the "data" folder
 - save the script and not the workspace image
 - re-start the R Project


## Dataset

Please download the dataset we will use for this part: https://drive.google.com/file/d/0ByVRhhevgqJgZjJRSmZrbmpzSFFacUZyZkVsTkpoZU12a0pv/view?usp=sharing
